As the MAXIMALS and PREDACONS began to abandon the room, the room
continued=
 to rumble and shake as pieces of ceiling and floor began to
crack, large p=
ieces of stalactites falling from the ceiling and
crashing dangerously to t=
he floor.

LEO PRIME instantly began to =91chase=92 TUSCON  as the other MA=
XIMALS
also took up 'pursuit' as well, some of them more vigorously then
ot=
hers, as not all of them were as aware of TUSCON's ruse as some
were.

The =
PREDACONS also took off. Those who could drill were tunneling
their way to =
safety, while the rest of them took off into the only
other tunnel that was=
 left open, the one that all the water had poured
through. It had long sinc=
e stopped dumping tons of water into the
room, and now probably led to some=
 reservoir or surface lake. In
either case it led out of this room.

From t=
he pit there was a shriek, sounding like a bird for a moment and
then perha=
ps even that of a dragon!

Magma began to spew from the pit!!

(TAG)

- Pre=
ston
